data.title: Kandawala Sri Lanka Grid, SLD99 Sri Lanka Grid 1999
data.meta_description: Batch convert Sri Lankan coordinates. Single-click conversion of Kandawala Sri Lanka Grid, SLD99 Sri Lanka Grid 1999.
data.text:
Convert Sri Lanka Coordinates in a Single Click

Using ExpertGPS as a Sri Lankan GPS, GIS, and CAD Coordinate Converter

With just a single click, you can do Sri Lankan datum conversions or re-project entire files of coordinate data between Sri Lankan coordinate formats. ExpertGPS supports all of the coordinate formats used in Sri Lanka, including Kandawala Sri Lanka Grid, SLD99 Sri Lanka Grid 1999, UTM, and latitude and longitude.

You can convert your GPS, GIS, or CAD data to any of these formats by bringing it into ExpertGPS and then selecting Change Coordinate Format... on the Options menu in ExpertGPS. Your data is instantly reprojected to the new datum and coordinate format.

Even if your GPS doesn't support the coordinate grid format you use for a project at work, you can use ExpertGPS to seamlessly move your data between your GPS and your workstation, reprojecting the data on-the-fly to match the coordinate system you use in AutoCAD or ArcGIS. ExpertGPS also creates Excel CSV and Google Earth KML files so you can create reports or view your coordinate data over high-resolution aerial imagery and GPS maps of Sri Lanka.

ExpertGPS Converts Between Any of These Sri Lankan Coordinate Formats:

hddd.ddddd° (Lat/Lon Degrees)

hddd° mm.mmm' (Lat/Lon Degrees & Minutes)

hddd° mm' ss.s" (Lat/Lon Deg. Min. Sec.)

Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM)

Military Grid Reference System (MGRS)

Kandawala Sri Lanka Grid - EPSG 5234

SLD99 Sri Lanka Grid 1999 - EPSG 5235

ExpertGPS Reprojects Your Data Between Any of These Datums:

World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS 84) - EPSG 4326

World Geodetic System 1972 (WGS 72) - EPSG 4322

Kandawala

Sri Lanka Datum 1999 - EPSG 5233

Download now and start your free trial of ExpertGPS 8.66

New features were added to ExpertGPS on July 22, 2024

ExpertGPS runs on Windows 11 and Windows 10.
